dialogue: Zsofia!
What's happened?
I'm sorry I didn't tell you.
What happened?
It might not be permanent-
Someone hurt you?
It's osteoporosis from the famine-
I can dye my hair. I know it's ugly.
Shh.
Where's Attila?
I didn't want him to be disappointed if for any reason you were delayed.
Zsofia, dear.
Welcome to America.
Are you angry?
Laszlo, are you angry with me?
If you'd like to start a row with me, I might as well work out my English-
Stop it. Your English is perfectly all right. It was an unimaginative joke he made about you shining shoes.
Tomorrow, I'll take you to see someone. A specialist.
Don't be angry with me.
Do you not want to be with me anymore?
Stop this nonsense.
Do you think I look older?
We are older.
Can't you say anything kind to me?
I love you, you cow.
You can touch me.
I don't want to hurt you- physically.
You won't... I had dreams- every night, I dreamt I was with you.
I know what you've done, Laszlo, and it's all right...
What are you talking about?

Laszlo, I know. I know. I know everything. You see, I became sick. Very sick. I could hardly breathe. I yearned to be with you and it made me sick. I almost died. Between life and death, I began having fantasies about you but I realized they were not fantasies at all, but visions! I was with you. All the time I was with you.
Laszlo, I know what you've done. I'm not jealous because I was with you the all the time. I know everything that has happened to you, and I am here now and I will never leave you.
Oh god! MY LOVE. MY LOVE!     I CANNOT
You can. Shh... You can. We have a new life. A new language. We can start again.
Sorry.
Maggie Lee lent me some hair product!
Laszlo, are you there?
I am.
The model is beautiful, darling! So beautiful.
We're taking a bus into the city this afternoon to visit Attila. The stop is very nearby! Would you like to come?
I have something this afternoon.
I've missed him. Just hearing him mill about in the other room. It's...
Fantastic.
Perhaps we should see about some language classes this afternoon? You could take the bus in on your own... ZSOFIA hardly reacts.
I am positive it is the last place you would like to be but it's good for you and I can brief the instructor or whomever about your situation. Listening to me babble on will only get you so far.
Never. Good night, Mr. Van Buren.
What's the rush?
We can talk at the house.
Can you slow down?
I am forfeiting the remainder of my fee due to some expenses unforeseen.
So, that's what the son kept alluding to.
Yes. He's a snake.
Don't go near him Zsofia.
All right, so what will that mean for us?
I will figure something out.
We will figure something out. I suppose we can make due on my salary.
-your salary?
Mr. Van Buren's helped me with a job interview in New York City. I'm sure once they meet me, they won't be able to resist me.
What are you doing?
Oh, I'm just looking at you.
What do you think?
It's unusual. Even for you.
You think so?
Many rooms are quite small. The ceilings are high...
Yes. Inside, you must look upwards.
So, which part of it are we paying for?
The height of the ceilings. The glass above.
The service is in here?
It's too much!
What's too much?!
The pain is too much. I need Zsofia! She has my medication.
You're making me a mess to clean up.
STOP IT! You're acting like a child.
It's over.
You have to march over there right now and get him excited again. Keep him engaged. You know how these rich fellows are. For him, it's like refurbishing a kitchen.
Two people are in the hospital.
That's not your fault-
Darling, it's over.
Oh, how exciting. What is it Laszlo?
Please. Zsofia, go ahead.
Harrison's asked me back.
Michael came by the office today. Insurance monies came through. They plan to forego the library to compensate for legal expenses but they want to complete the project.
What about your job here at Heywood?
You throw everything up in the air, just like that?
I don't like that man.
You scarcely knew him.
He dropped you as quickly as he took you on.
You've already said yes, I take it?
He's in Roma on business and would like me to join him to review marbles for the altarpiece in Carrara.
See! I told you that for him it's like doing a kitchen!
Everyone is leaving me.
It's not just this trip. You'll be at Doylestown again now... I'll be fine on my own.
I will make arrangements.
Promise you won't let it drive you mad.
I promise.
It's time to go! You'll be late!
Your childish show-boating puts everyone else here at risk! Are you thick?! Are you lame?! You report to the subcontractor. You tell him that you've been let go.
Gordon, can you get him to stop shouting at everyone?
Laszlo, that's enough!
There must be an unpaid parking meter around here somewhere, Jimmy! Be vigilant! Keep your eyes peeled!
What is it?
It was unnecessary how you treated that boy is all.
Their safety is my priority.
And Gordon, don't even get me started.
It is not what you said to that young man, it is how.
Would you like us to wait around another few years for another lawsuit to resolve itself? I am SICK of it. Do you hear me?! Beat.
I finish THIS or WE are finished.
Speak for yourself! I am NOT finished. Living with you is impossible. You've become a selfish old bastard right before my very eyes!
Don't say something you'll regret in the morning.
You want to kill us?

I'd get out of the car and march all the way back to Manhattan if I could, you egotistic scoundrel. There is NO REASON for me to be here. I am here for you! I could do my ridiculous job ANYWHERE! Do you think I went to university to write about lipsticks! Shame on you.
Ask him about that. Did he tell you that he kicked me to the street like a dog?
His bitch wife accused me of making a pass at her.
You would never do that.
I did NOT do that.
Why would she say such a thing?
Because they do not want us here.
Of course Attila wants us here.
Not Attila.
Who do you mean?
The people here, they do not want us here. Audrey, Attila's Catholic wife DOES NOT WANT US HERE. We are nothing. Worse than nothing.
You poor man. My poor husband. What's been robbed of you-
Zsofia!
She's gone, darling. She isn't here. You must calm yourself. You've worked yourself up is all.
I am in pain. I am close to death.
You are not. I am so sorry I upset you.
Get me my pills, it's too much.
There is only a pill, cut in halves! Do you keep some in your purse?
There is only half. Do you keep more in your purse?
What will I do? The pain won't stop coming.
I found something.
It's what they gave me on the boat for my broken face-
Shh. You'll feel better soon, just listen to my voice, dear.
Do you have more?
I love you.
Keep going. Harder.
I'll wait outside. Tell me when you need me.
Darling, have you finished?
Can I come in?
HELP! Someone help me! My wife is dying!
Please help her, she's dying.
Last night, I met God and he granted me permission to call him by his name. It is not the first time we have met.
What did you do to me, my Laszlo?
It was an accident.
Do you remember everything you confessed to me at home in our bed?
You needn't be ashamed, my darling. The harm done unto us were done only to our physical bodies.
You were right. This place is rotten. The landscape. The food we eat. This whole country is rotten.
I'm going to Israel to be with Zsofia and her child. I want to become the grandmother to her that she will, otherwise, never encounter.
Come home with me.
I will follow you until I die.
